description.displayText: Heather has been nothing but a blessing for us! Not only is she amazing with the kids, she is also amazing with our fur babies and babysits them too while we are away.  We would highly recommend Heather!! She's overall the full package. Sweet, compassionate, trustworthy, courteous, and most importantly, reliable. Can't say enough wonder things about Heather.
description.originalText: Heather has been nothing but a blessing for us! Not only is she amazing with the kids, she is also amazing with our fur babies and babysits them too while we are away.  We would highly recommend Heather!! She's overall the full package. Sweet, compassionate, trustworthy, courteous, and most importantly, reliable. Can't say enough wonder things about Heather.

description.displayText:
Heather babysat our son from the age of 7 months to 2 years old, twice per week. She also watched our 2 kids together when the older one was off from school. We only stopped using her because of scheduling and daycare opportunities. We still use her for date night. 

Our son is very high energy and has a ton of food allergies. Heather was brave enough to take on following our very specific instructions of how he needed to be fed. She also did a great job of taking him to the playground and library so they were not in the apartment all day. She taught him manners, read to him and worked on colors, letters and numbers. She always communicated with us when they were together and if she had any issues with her commute. She took great care of both our kids! We highly recommend her!

description.displayText: We LOVE Heather.  She's on time, thoughtful, hard working, and  interacts wonderfully with our son.  The only reason I've put off reviewing her is because I don't want anyone to steal her away from us!!!
